text: Will McBride (January 10, 1931 â€“ January 29, 2015) was an American photographer in reportage, art photography and book illustration, as well as, a painter and sculptor. He was known for his works that were against censorship in the United States, like pictures of people naked. McBride was born in St. Louis, Missouri and raised in Chicago, Illinois. His entire career was based in Berlin. McBride died in his home in Berlin at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American photographers Category:American journalists Category:American painters Category:Artists from Chicago Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Writers from Chicago Category:People from Berlin
title: Will McBride (photographer)
